DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Cells of, or derived from, a malignant tumor._Taken out of, separated from, or eliminated._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2748813
ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedSubstanceAdministration [DCI] > StudyAgent > Biologic [stem cells] > Subject [Stem Cells] > PerformedProcedure.methodCode(CD).originalText WHERE PerformedSubstanceAdministration > DefinedSubstanceAdministration.nameCode = "Administer Donor Cellular Infusion(DCI)" AND PerformedProcedure > DefinedProcedure.nameCode = "Perform Autologous Malignant Cell Removal"
